text: Ezɨ Devitɨn avebam Eliap orazima, Devit gumaziba ko mɨgei. Ezɨ an navim ikuvizɨma a kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ tizim bagha kagh ize? Tinara nɨn sipsipɨn muziariba gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn dar gara dagh eghufi? Kɨ fo, nɨ ifari, nɨ orazi puvatɨgha puvɨra ifaghatir gumazim. Nɨ pura daru mɨdorozimɨn ganasa ize, biziba puvatɨ.”
